action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex
systemctl status docker
docker load -i installation-resources/db-container 
docker run -d -p 6379-6380:6379-6380 -p 16379-16380:16379-16380 -p 26379:26379 -p 9042:9042 --name database hbcheng/redis:devenv

cp installation-resources/bolt /usr/local/bin/
cp installation-resources/bolt.conf.json /etc/
cp installation-resources/bolt.service /etc/systemd/system/

sleep 10

systemctl start bolt

sleep 10

systemctl restart bolt

action_list.description: System action for deleting an application. Deletes created VMs as well
action_list.name: action_delete

action_list.description: System action for starting an application
action_list.name: action_start

action_list.description: System action for stopping an application
action_list.name: action_stop

action_list.description: System action for deleting an application. Does not delete created VMs
action_list.name: action_soft_delete

action_list.description: System action for restarting an application
action_list.name: action_restart

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
chpasswd:
  list: |
    root:nutanix/4u
  expire: False
disable_root: false
ssh_pwauth:   true

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash

systemctl stop firewalld
systemctl disable firewalld
sed -i 's/permissive/disabled/' /etc/sysconfig/selinux

rpm --import "https://sks-keyservers.net/pks/lookup?op=get&search=0xee6d536cf7dc86e2d7d56f59a178ac6c6238f52e"

yum install -y yum-utils wget redis

yum-config-manager --add-repo https://packages.docker.com/1.13/yum/repo/main/centos/7

yum update -y

yum install -y docker-engine

wget http://10.4.16.50/home/saratkumar.k/installation-resources.tar

wget http://www-eu.apache.org/dist/cassandra/2.2.11/apache-cassandra-2.2.11-bin.tar.gz

pvcreate /dev/sdb
vgextend centos /dev/sdb
lvextend -L +100G /dev/centos/root
xfs_growfs /dev/centos/root

tar -xvf installation-resources.tar
tar -zxvf apache-cassandra-2.2.11-bin.tar.gz

echo '{
  "storage-driver": "devicemapper"
}' | tee /etc/docker/daemon.json

echo 'root        hard nofile 8192
root        soft nofile 8192' | tee -a /etc/security/limits.conf

systemctl enable docker
systemctl start docker

echo '127.0.0.1 api.bc.local' | tee -a /etc/hosts

nohup bash -c "sleep 2 && reboot" &

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for uninstalling an application
action_list.name: action_uninstall
